GULF OF GUINEA.
SAO TOME AND PRINCIPE.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 01-17N 006-07E AT 280945Z DEC.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
   AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO IMB
   PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,

   TO MDAT-GOG, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,

2. CANCEL THIS MSG 041250Z JAN 20.
